trans-unit.source: Type of representation. Possible options are the "hearts" or "stars".
trans-unit.target: Type of representation. Possible options are the "hearts" or "stars".

trans-unit.source: Number of hearts/stars which are shown.
trans-unit.target: Number of hearts/stars which are shown.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the text should appear above or below the hearts or stars.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether the text should appear above or below the hearts or stars.

trans-unit.source: Number of entries displayed per page in the representation of ratings in the backend.
trans-unit.target: Number of entries displayed per page in the representation of ratings in the backend.

trans-unit.source: The same ip address may vote more than once for the same rating?
trans-unit.target: The same ip address may vote more than once for the same rating?

trans-unit.source: A logged in frontend user may vote more than once for the same rating?
trans-unit.target: A logged in frontend user may vote more than once for the same rating?

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the template for the rating.
trans-unit.target: Here you can select the template for the rating.

trans-unit.source:
Label for ratings. Variables are replaced
available variables:
%current% - current rating
%max% - max. possible rating
%type% - type of rating (hearts/stars)
%count% - number of votes
[singular|plural] - Text for votes

examples:
%current%/%max% (%count% [vote|votes]) returns 3.7/5 stars (7 votes)
%count% [Like|Likes] returns 1 Like or 4 Likes
trans-unit.target:
Label for ratings. Variables are replaced
available variables:
%current% - current rating
%max% - max. possible rating
%type% - type of rating (hearts/stars)
%count% - number of votes
[singular|plural] - Text for votes

examples:
%current%/%max% (%count% [vote|votes]) returns 3.7/5 stars (7 votes)
%count% [Like|Likes] returns 1 Like or 4 Likes

trans-unit.source: Display the text above the hearts/stars
trans-unit.target: Display the text above the hearts/stars

trans-unit.source: Display the text below the heart / star
trans-unit.target: Display the text below the heart / star
